work.name: UCL Centre for Artificial Intelligence
work.summary: Research on the coherence of traffic motion forecasting, serving as a fundamental component in the autonomous driving vehicles pipeline.

work.name: Vision and Imaging Science Group, UCL
work.summary: Research on the integration of Invariant Scattering Networks into Deep Reinforcement Learning for the purpose of achieving comparable agent performances with a reduction in required training samples.

publications.name: Zur Elektrody/namik bewegter Körper
publications.summary: It concerned an interpretation of the Michelson–Morley experiment and the properties of light and time. Special relativity incorporates the principle that the speed of light is the same for all inertial observers regardless of the state of motion of the source.

competitions.title: UCL Team Software Lead
competitions.summary: Leading a team to design, construct, and operate a fully autonomous rover from scratch for a simulated Mars sample return mission, tackling complex systems engineering to meet real space mission requirements.

competitions.title: Team Lead, 1st Place Participant
competitions.summary: Engineered a carrier robot from the ground up with limited equipments and programmed it to autonomously execute a series of challenging path‑planning and navigation tasks.

volunteer.summary: Collaborate with young people, parents, teachers, and professionals in schools, colleges, and community groups through our evidence-based, multi-component drug and alcohol program, designed according to best practices to achieve the most effective outcomes.
